name: Teal-Tan-Tomato
description:
Play online vs other players in this Tic-Tac-Toe variant!

Register just by logging in with a new user name and password.

How to play

In this game, you may choose what symbol (color) to use on every move!

Left click to use Teal. 
Right click to use Tomato.

You'll win by finalizing a row of 3 of the same color, even if you didn't put all of them yourself. 

Just remember that your opponent may also use both colors!

There's a timer for each move, so keep up the pace. 

How was it made

This game uses a network library called Game Jam Multiplayer, that I am writing. It will become a Unity Asset eventually. Follow me on twitter for updates!
